articles.title: Hot Stocks: Brokerage upgrades Kotak Bank & D-Mart post Q4 results - The Economic Times
articles.description: Following the fourth-quarter results, JPMorgan upgraded Kotak Mahindra Bank and Avenue Supermarts. It maintains a neutral rating on Britannia Industries and an underweight rating on Tata Technologies.
articles.content: Brokerage firm JPMorgan upgraded Kotak Mahindra Bank and Avenue Supermarts post Q4 results. JPMorgan has a neutral rating on Britannia Industries and an underweight rating on Tata Technologies.We hav… [+2043 chars]

articles.author: Shiyin Chen
articles.title: EQT to Buy Tech Consultant Perficient in $3 Billion Deal - Bloomberg
articles.description: EQT AB agreed to buy technology consultant Perficient Inc. in a deal valued at about $3 billion including debt.
articles.content:
EQT AB agreed to buy technology consultant Perficient Inc. in a deal valued at about $3 billion including debt.
Shareholders will receive $76 per share in the sale to BPEA Private Equity Fund VIII, … [+251 chars]
